name: Hero Defense (itch) (Phil033)
description:
Made for Weekend Jam #02 https://itch.io/jam/weekend-jam-2

Tower-Defense / Puzzle Game where a Hero tries to get into your evil lair.

Like any good super villain would, you defend yourself with the best of equipment.

RMB (hold) + W, A, S, D - look around

Skybox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cl...

Camera Controller is a Unity Standard Asset

All other Assets/Scripts are original
